array.string: <b:t>There are</b:t> <b:ot tag="a">2 groups</b:ot> <b:t>of</b:t> <b:ot tag="b">2 goo</b:ot> <b:t>Express the total number of goo in an expression.</b:t>

<b:commlkp lkpid="cl1"> <b:lkpitem tag="a">2</b:lkpitem> <b:lkpitem tag="b">2</b:lkpitem> </b:commlkp> <b:commot lkpid="cl1" sample="2" preftag="a" /> <b:oo value="x" picker="yes" /> <b:commot lkpid="cl1" sample="2" preftag="b" />
